amendment.description: An amendment printed in part A of House Report 108-470 and considered as adopted pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 607. The amendment makes permanent the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 increase in the phase out of the earned income credit for joint filers, in addition to making permanent the increased standard deduction and the broader 15% bracket for joint filers.
